00198         struct Parameters: public std::map<std::string, boost::any>
00199         {
00201                 Parameters(){}
00203 
00206                 Parameters(const std::string& key, const boost::any& value){(*this)[key] = value;}
00208 
00212                 template<typename  T>
00213                 T get(const std::string& key, const T& defaultValue) const
00214                 {
00215                         const_iterator it(find(key));
00216                         if (it != end())
00217                                 return boost::any_cast<T>(it->second);
00218                         else
00219                                 return defaultValue;
00220                 }
00221         };

00232                 typedef int Index;
